job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree Information Technology (or equivalent educational focus 10+ years)

jd: From: vikas gupta, 1 point system llc vikas.g@1pointsys.com Reply to: vikas.g@1pointsys.com Hi,This side Vikas from 1pointsys. Hope you are doing well, I have a job position for you.Job Title:- Senior Cloud engineerLocation:- Must be located in PA, Delaware, NY ,NJ, VA,WVA, Wash DC or Maryland (Local)Job Description:-• Bachelor’s Degree Information Technology (or equivalent educational focus 10+ years) is required.• 15+ years of total IT experience• 4+ years of Cloud experience• Must be expert with cloud services such as Entra ID and Landing Zone components• Must have projects that implemented and supported Azure cloud native services• PowerShell scripting or automation experience• Must have cross platform enterprise experience across IT (Server, Network, Storage, Security).• Must be a highly motivated individual with strong analytical, problem solving and multi-tasking skills complimenting a passion for learning/sharing information from and with peers.• Must be able to work a 24x7 On-Call shift as needed.Preferred Technical Expertise:• Azure Architect CertificationPreferred skillsEntra IDConditional Access policyAzure PolicySubscriptionAzure vNetRoute tablePrivate DNS ZonesPrivate DNS ResolverPrivate EndpointsNSG (Network Security Group)Azure NetApp FilesAzure Backup ServiceKey Vault - App specificLoad Balancer and App GatewayData Factory, Web App services, Functions, Databricks, Storage Blob, File Share Best regardsVikas GuptaTechnical Recruiter– 1Point System llcvikas.g@1pointsys.com || www.1pointsys.com
